#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{   long long int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
      long long int i;
      cin>>i;
      if(i%2==0 && i>0)
      {
          cout<<"Yes"<<endl;

      }
      else
        cout<<"No"<<endl;

    }
return 0;
}
